designScenario.name: Advanced Integrated Navigation System (AINS)
designScenario.description: A next-generation navigation system combining multi-constellation GNSS, hybrid inertial navigation, and AI-driven predictive routing for optimal flight efficiency and safety. Incorporates real-time space weather monitoring, terrain awareness, and cyber-resilient architecture to address modern aviation challenges in congested airspace and evolving threat environments.

details.description: Integrate GPS (L1/L5), Galileo (E1/E5), and GLONASS (G1/G3) signals with inertial reference system and celestial navigation backup
Implement sensor fusion algorithms combining ADS-B, DME, and VOR data for ground-based verification
Maintain 3D position accuracy of ±2.5 meters (95% CEP) under ionospheric disturbance conditions
Achieve 50 Hz update rate for attitude determination with <5ms latency from sensor input to output
Implement quantum-resistant encryption for all GNSS signal processing chains
Quadruple redundant navigation computers with dissimilar architecture (x86/ARM/RISC-V)
Support in-flight reconfiguration for alternative navigation during GNSS denial scenarios
Provide 3D weather radar integration with navigation path optimization

systemComponents.name: Multi-Constellation GNSS Receiver
systemComponents.description: Software-defined radio supporting simultaneous reception of GPS, Galileo, GLONASS, and BeiDou signals with anti-spoofing capabilities

subComponents.name: Phased Array Antenna
subComponents.description: Active electronically scanned array with beamforming and null-steering capabilities

subComponents.name: Cryptographic Signal Validator
subComponents.description: Hardware-based signal authentication using Galileo OSNMA and GPS Chimera protocols

systemComponents.name: Laser Inertial Reference System
systemComponents.description: Ring laser gyroscope cluster with hemispherical resonator accelerometers and thermal stabilization

subComponents.name: RLG Triad
subComponents.description: Three orthogonal ring laser gyros with <0.001°/hr bias stability

subComponents.name: Vibration Compensation Unit
subComponents.description: Adaptive filtering for mechanical vibration rejection up to 2kHz

systemComponents.name: AI Navigation Processor
systemComponents.description: Neuromorphic computing unit for predictive route optimization and anomaly detection

subComponents.name: Terrain Prediction Engine
subComponents.description: Machine learning model for 4D trajectory planning considering weather and traffic

subComponents.name: Quantum Navigation Simulator
subComponents.description: Particle filter-based dead reckoning module for GNSS-denied environments

systemComponents.name: Cyber-Physical Interface
systemComponents.description: Hardened data diode system for navigation data distribution to other aircraft systems

systemComponents.name: Emergency Navigation Suite
systemComponents.description: Independent MEMS-based inertial system with celestial alignment capability

subComponents.name: Stellar Tracker
subComponents.description: Short-wave infrared star tracker with 0.1 arcsecond resolution

subComponents.name: MEMS IMU Cluster
subComponents.description: Redundant micro-electromechanical sensors with atomic clock synchronization

relationships.description: Fuses raw GNSS measurements with inertial data for tightly coupled navigation solution
Embedded security co-processor validates all navigation outputs before system distribution
Receives periodic alignment updates from primary inertial system during normal operation
Provides cross-check validation of backup system integrity through dissimilar algorithms
Feeds authenticated GNSS data to aircraft systems through secure gateway

attributes.name: positionalIntegrity
attributes.description: Assured position uncertainty bound for RNP 0.3 operations

attributes.name: temporalResolution
attributes.description: Precision timekeeping using integrated atomic clock and GNSS discipline

attributes.name: spectrumResilience
attributes.description: Multi-band GNSS reception with interference mitigation across aviation bands

attributes.name: faultContainment
attributes.description: Automotive Safety Integrity Level D certification for all safety-critical components

attributes.name: thermalTolerance
attributes.description: MIL-STD-810H compliant environmental hardening for global deployment
